activity.text:
@abhimanyurajeesh The current implementation persists the sidebar's "expanded" or "collapsed" state using cookies, and it works correctly on the web screen. However, for mobile, the cookie logic was not implemented. I found a solution that correctly reflects the sidebar's open or closed state based on the current implementation, but the state is not being persisted in the cookie.

This line of code is able to fix the current bug.

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12038
activity.text:
The cookie we store in the browser, which controls the open and close state of the sidebar, is not updating on mobile devices when opening and closing the tab. It works correctly on the web screen, and also, the cookie is not being set initially, which is causing this issue.
